name: b2c-policy-build
description: Replaces placeholders in Azure AD B2C policy files with settings from a settings file
author: Joonas Westlin, Daniel Klotz

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: One of the environments in appsettings.json

inputs.name: inputFolder
inputs.label: Input folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder containing custom policy files and appsettings.json

inputs.name: outputFolder
inputs.label: Output folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to folder where built policy files are written

inputs.name: additionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Additional settings as key-value pairs, one per line. E.g.

ApiUrl=https://test.com
ApiKey=$(ApiKey)
